scripts.dev: bash -lc "set -euo pipefail; if [ -t 0 ]; then read -p 'Select RPC source ([l]ocal/[r]emote, default remote): ' choice; else choice='remote'; fi; if [ -z \"${choice:-}\" ]; then choice='remote'; fi; choice=$(printf '%s' \"$choice\" | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]'); if [ \"$choice\" = 'local' ] || [ \"$choice\" = 'l' ]; then export RPC_URL_31337=\"${RPC_URL_31337:-http://127.0.0.1:8545}\"; echo \"→ Using local RPC: $RPC_URL_31337\"; else unset RPC_URL_31337 || true; echo '→ Using remote RPC: https://vfgvanuabr.eu-central-1.awsapprunner.com/'; fi; LOG_LEVEL=${LOG_LEVEL:-trace} LOG_STRATEGY=${LOG_STRATEGY:-console-pretty} TUI_OFF=${TUI_OFF:-true} envio dev"
